name: users.profile.set
desc: Set a user's profile information, including custom status.

name.desc: Name of a single key to set. Usable only if `profile` is not passed.

profile.desc: Collection of key:value pairs presented as a URL-encoded JSON hash. At most 50 fields may be set. Each field name is limited to 255 characters.

user.desc: ID of user to change. This argument may only be specified by admins on paid teams.

value.desc: Value to set a single key to. Usable only if `profile` is not passed.

examples:
{
    "ok": true,
    "profile": {
        "title": "Head of Coffee Production",
        "phone": "",
        "skype": "",
        "real_name": "John Smith",
        "real_name_normalized": "John Smith",
        "display_name": "john",
        "display_name_normalized": "john",
        "fields": {
            "Xf0111111": {
                "value": "Barista",
                "alt": ""
            },
            "Xf0222222": {
                "value": "2022-04-11",
                "alt": ""
            },
            "Xf0333333": {
                "value": "https://example.com",
                "alt": ""
            }
        },
        "status_text": "Watching cold brew steep",
        "status_emoji": ":coffee:",
        "status_emoji_display_info": [],
        "status_expiration": 0,
        "avatar_hash": "123xyz",
        "start_date": "2022-03-21",
        "email": "johnsmith@example.com",
        "pronouns": "they/them/theirs",
        "huddle_state": "default_unset",
        "huddle_state_expiration_ts": 0,
        "first_name": "john",
        "last_name": "smith",
        "image_24": "https://.../...-24.png",
        "image_32": "https://.../...-32.png",
        "image_48": "https://.../...-48.png",
        "image_72": "https://.../...-72.png",
        "image_192": "https://.../....-192png",
        "image_512": "https://.../...-512.png"
    }
}

errors.cannot_update_admin_user: Only a primary owner can update the profile of an admin.
errors.invalid_profile: Profile object passed in is not valid JSON (make sure it is URL encoded!).
errors.must_clear_both_status_text_and_status_e: Clearing the status requires setting both `status_text` and `status_emoji` to ''.
errors.not_admin: Only admins can update the profile of another user. Some fields, like `email` may only be updated by an admin.
errors.not_app_admin: Only team owners and selected members can update the profile of a bot user.
errors.reserved_name: First or last name are reserved.
errors.too_long: You attempted to set a custom status but it was longer than the maximum allowed, 100.
errors.username_same: Username is the same as the current username.
